sections.heading: Short title. This Act may be cited as the Industrialized Residential Structure Deed Restriction Act.
sections.text: Short title. This Act may be cited as the Industrialized Residential Structure Deed Restriction Act.

sections.heading: Definitions.  As used in this Act:
sections.text: Definitions. As used in this Act:

sections.heading: Deed restriction or restrictive covenant concerning erection of industrialized residential structure.
sections.text: Deed restriction or restrictive covenant concerning erection of industrialized residential structure.

sections.heading: Aesthetic compatibility requirement permitted.
sections.text: A deed restriction, restrictive covenant, or agreement that applies uniformly to all homes and industrialized residential structures in a subdivision may impose the same aesthetic compatibility requirements on an industrialized residential structure in the subdivision that are applicable to all residential structures in the subdivision.

sections.heading: Application.    This Act applies only to deed restrictions or restrictive covenants that are recorded on or after the effective date of this Act.
sections.text: Application. This Act applies only to deed restrictions or restrictive covenants that are recorded on or after the effective date of this Act.
